idea-plugin.name: Base16 Darktooth
idea-plugin.vendor: Jason Milkins (https://github.com/jasonm23), Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Darktooth for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Jason Milkins (https://github.com/jasonm23). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
